main event: Two objects resembling fiery balls were observed in the sky near Kodiak, Alaska, on April 3, 1949.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a greenish-blue color., The objects were observed moving from west to east at high speeds., One witness estimated the apparent size of the objects to be around 1-1/2 feet in diameter., One eyewitness reported hearing a whistling sound associated with the objects., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes.
sighted object: two fiery balls in the sky
witness description: Naval officers and a local cab driver
